value:
So, this is...another world, you say?
Ya never know what life'll have in
store, eh? Well, more stories to tell!

Pirates killed my family, and I rushed
to avenge them... Nearly cost me my
life. But the Priestess saved me!

Don't go pushin' yourself too hard.
Giving your all is good, but ya can't
do it all without relaxin' sometimes!

Ya busy? If ya have the time, would
ya wanna grab a bite? Doesn't much
matter what kind! Whatever you like.

Huh? Oh, I'm just polishin' my armor.
Gotta be ready for anything, anytime!
Speaking of...when's our next battle?

Seems $Nf's got
a soft spot for ya.
Oh, yeah! How about THIS?
Just gotta keep this up!
Guh. Not my best. Sorry...

Oh! For me? ...Ya mean it?
Hey, thanks, pal.

Hey there! Name's Valbar. If you're
lookin' for some muscle, I'm your
man. Just shout if ya ever need me!

The Heroes in your service really put
in the work. Good on 'em! 'Course,
there are a few oddballs too, but...$k$pWell, my guys are unique in their
own right. They do mean well, but...
they can be a real handful too.$k$pThat said, they stood by me in my
darkest hour... Takin' on a fight that
was...ill-advised, to put it lightly.$k$pNo words can express my gratitude.
And I know if I managed to tell 'em
how I feel, they'd all just laugh it off.$k$pHm... Think I should give it a shot, do
ya? Well...since it's coming from you,
I'll think on it. How 'bout that?
でやあっ！
逃がさん！
ぐうっ…
いかん…！
It ends here!
You're all the same!
I'll make you pay!
I'll smash ya to bits!
I...failed.
Haha!
The name's Valbar. These days, I follow the Priestess wherever she goes and protect her.
What's up? Any skulls need crackin' or are you just lookin' for entertainment?
Me and my team... We take good care of each other.
I still owe the Priestess for savin' my sorry hide.
No way I'm gonna get bored fightin' alongside The Order! I'm itchin' to get out there and have some fun.
I'll fight to protect the innocent... I owe it to my family. *ahem* So, whatever you need, I'm your man!
Pretty busy out here for a Summoner! Lemme lighten the burden a bit...whaddaya need?
Whatever ya need!
Huh?
Leave it to me!
